sys_ux_client_script.name: close modal

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_27788f5c67e2021089dee0052fc6c4d0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">67788f5cd1e202107a22a1c6dcfdafe4</macroponent><name>close modal</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     if (event.elementId == 'button_6' || event.elementId == 'button_8') { // When user clicks on Approve or reject button
        api.setState('approvalState', true);
        if (event.elementId == 'button_6') { // Approve button is clicked
            helpers.modal.close('custom_3');
        } else { // Reject button is clicked
            helpers.modal.close('custom_4');
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'button_5' || event.elementId == 'button_7') { // When user clicks on Cancel button from both the modals
        api.setState("cardID", event.payload.sysId);
        if(event.elementId == 'button_5'){
            helpers.modal.close('custom_3');
        }else{
          helpers.modal.close('custom_4');  
        }
    } else { // When user clicks on Close icon on modal
        if (api.state.approvalState == false) {
            api.setState("cardID", event.payload.sysId);
        } else {
            api.setState('approvalState', false);
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 20:19:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>27788f5c67e2021089dee0052fc6c4d0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>close modal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_27788f5c67e2021089dee0052fc6c4d0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 20:19:08</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
